sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_cs_auto_resolution_simulation_configuration</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_cs_auto_resolution_simulation_configuration">state=running^EQ<item display_value="Running" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="running"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Abort delete when simulation is running</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { current.setAbortAction(true); var redirectURL = AutoResolutionConstants.SIMULATION_CONFIG_TABLE_NAME + '.do?sys_id=' + current.getValue('sys_id'); gs.setRedirect(redirectURL); gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("You can't delete a configuration during simulation. Please try again after the simulation completes, is cancelled, or reaches an error state.")); })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-05-04 17:47:36</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1586e9e3ff332010635f056d793bf11f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Abort delete when simulation is running</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">81ddf4a03c75311068bcf327dfe37fa6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1586e9e3ff332010635f056d793bf11f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-01 21:49:05</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1586e9e3ff332010635f056d793bf11f"/> </record_update>
